Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN BEGIN TRY
SELECT sts.ServiceId , sts.ServiceName FROM dbo.StreamingService AS sts ORDER BY sts.ServiceName ;
END TRY BEGIN CATCH ;THROW END CATCH
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
/* -- ====================================================== -- Author: Carlos Gonzalez -- Date Created: 2025-11-23 -- Description: Lists all streaming services for parameter selection. --------------------------------------------------------- -- YYYY-MM-DD - Author - Change -- -- ====================================================== */ CREATE PROCEDURE [reporting].[ListStreamingServices]
AS

Property.Name: Value
Property.Value: N'When the record was created in UTC'

Property.Value: N'Is the artist still making music?'
